summary: This document is an email chain from November 2021 regarding the preparation and distribution of juror questionnaires for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It involves coordination among legal team members to review questionnaires, assign them, and share them with defense counsel.

events.title: Juror Questionnaires Prepared for Maxwell Trial
events.description: Juror questionnaires are scanned, uploaded to USAfx, and assigned to team members for review. The team is instructed to provide comments/objections by the next morning.

events.title: Spreadsheet Submission for Juror Review
events.description: A team member submits their completed spreadsheet for reviewing juror questionnaires as part of the jury selection process for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated November 12-13, 2021, concerning the Ghislaine Maxwell trial jury selection process.
Juror questionnaires were prepared, scanned, and uploaded to a system called USAfx for sharing with defense counsel.
Legal team members were assigned specific jurors to review and were given a deadline of 11 a.m. the next morning to submit comments or objections.
The email attachments include a spreadsheet titled 'ICopy_of US_v._Maxwell_Juror_Questionnaire_Review MASTER CHART_copy.xlsx' for tracking juror reviews.
The correspondence shows procedural coordination between prosecution team members, but all individual names are redacted.
